archimate:TechnologyService.name: AzureArtifacts
archimate:TechnologyService.documentation:
Create and share Maven, npm, NuGet, and Python package feeds from public and private sources https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/devops/artifacts/
Create and share Maven, npm, NuGet, and Python package feeds from public and private sources Add fully integrated package management to your continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines with a single click. Create and share Maven, npm, NuGet, and Python package feeds from public and private sources with teams of any size.
Share code efficiently Easily share code across small teams and large enterprises. Manage all package types Get universal artifact management for Maven, npm, NuGet, and Python. Add packages to any pipeline Share packages, and use built-in CI/CD, versioning, and testing.
Share code efficiently Easily share code across small teams and large enterprises. Manage all package types Get universal artifact management for Maven, npm, NuGet, and Python. Add packages to any pipeline Share packages, and use built-in CI/CD, versioning, and testing.
